prompts: Create a blue Pokemon with yellow eyes and a unique bipedal stance.
I want a playful amphibian Pokemon that thrives in wetlands and grasslands.
Generate a design for a small, blue, fighting-type Pokemon with distinctive gloves.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a frog but has a fierce demeanor and cool colors.
Imagine a Pokemon with a combination of blue and orange tones, showcasing its unique traits.
Design a bipedal Pokemon with a strong poison affinity and a vibrant personality.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies both a playful nature and a tough combat style.
